thread.title: BRIEF-LogMein Reports Q4 Non-GAAP EPS Of $1.20

title: BRIEF-LogMein Reports Q4 Non-GAAP EPS Of $1.20
text:
Feb 15 (Reuters) - Logmein Inc:
* LOGMEIN ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL YEAR 2017 RESULTS
* Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.20
* Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.74 * SEES Q1 REVENUE $276 MILLION TO $277 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $1.135 BILLION TO $1.15 BILLION * Q4 REVENUE $279.9 MILLION * ‍ NON-GAAP NET INCOME IS EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE $1.17 TO $1.18 PER DILUTED SHARE FOR Q1 2018​
* ‍ NON-GAAP NET INCOME IS EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF $5.43 TO $5.53 PER DILUTED SHARE FOR FY18​
* FY2017 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $4.21, REVENUE VIEW $1.02 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* QTRLY GAAP REVENUE WAS $276.0 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.17, REVENUE VIEW $277.2 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.10, REVENUE VIEW $277.9 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
